name: Not That Kind of Dream
description:
We put hundreds of hours into the project, and the current state is completely broken.

We have made every functionality separate, and when we were putting together they didn't work, and we didn't have the time to fix it. So I'm submitting this broken version to be part of the JAM. But we will continue to update the game since we don't care about being disqualified for the voting. All the matter is to have fun and create a good game!
